Name: Lede
Potrero Hill: As a sunny neighborhood where you can usually find an open parking space, Potrero Hill defies San Francisco stereotypes. This quiet neighborhood hugs the curves of the citys eastern hills, offering stunning views of the Financial District and the SF Bay. While Potrero Hill is home base for many laid-back local haunts and casual music venues, this polite area leaves it to nearby neighborhoods like SoMa and the Mission District to provide edgier entertainment options.

Name: Intro
Potrero Hill: Potrero Hill is a suburban-feeling oasis on San Francisco's sunny eastern peaks.

Name: Photo_Captions
Potrero Hill: ['Potrero Hill feels more like a small town than an urban neighborhood.', "Its colorful cottages and multi-level homes lend San Francisco's hillsides a quaint sophistication.", "You might lose your breath climbing Potrero Hill's steep inclines.", "No matter the shape you're in, if the ascent doesn't take your breath away, the sweeping views of the city will.", "Walk, shop, dine, and read. Whatever you do in Potrero Hill, don't do it in a rush.", 'Independence means something to the neighborhood.', 'Encounter a locally-owned, and locally-supported, business on every corner in Potrero Hill.', 'Gotcha.']
